member.name: T:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ContentAlignment
member.summary: Provides enumerated values for content alignment.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ContentAlignment.None
member.summary: No content alignment.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ContentAlignment.Top
member.summary: Align content at the top.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ContentAlignment.Right
member.summary: Align content to the right.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ContentAlignment.Bottom
member.summary: Align content at the bottom.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ContentAlignment.Left
member.summary: Align content to the left.

member.name: T:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions
member.summary: Represents an object that controls a part of an HTML generation process.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.CreateDefault
member.summary: Returns a new instance if the class using default values.

member.name: F:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.Default
member.summary: Gets the default control render options.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.RowCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class name for a grouped row.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.ColCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class name for a column in a grouped row.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.GroupWrapperTagName
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTML tag name for the element that wraps around a group of properties.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.GroupHeaderTagName
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTML tag name for the element that acts a the title for the group.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.GroupNameCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class name for a group.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.PropertyNameCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class name for a property.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.GenerateIdAttribute
member.summary: Indicates whether the 'id' attribute for a control should be computed.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.GenerateNameAttribute
member.summary: Indicates whether the 'name' attribute for a control should be added.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.NgModel
member.summary: Gets or sets the model prefix for the AngularJS ng-model attribute. If the value is null the ng-mnodel attribute is not added. If the value is empty the attribute is added without the prefix.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.DefaultCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the default CSS class for a rendered control.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.OptionsGetter
member.summary: Gets or sets a function callback used to retrieve a collection elements to use for a 'select' element or an input or type 'radio'.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.DisabledGetter
member.summary: Gets or sets a function callback used to dynamically retrieve the disabled state of an input.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.AdditionalAttributesGetter
member.summary: Gets or sets a function callback used to retrieve additional attributes.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.UniqueId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique control identifier.

member.name: P:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.ControlRenderOptions.CamelCaseId
member.summary: Determines whether to use camel-casing when generating the 'id' attribute.

member.name: T:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for an instance of the class.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.IsNotWhiteSpace(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified string is not null and not a System.String.Empty string after trimming. Functionally equivalent to the static method call !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(string).

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.IsWhiteSpace(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified string is null or a System.String.Empty string after trimming. Functionally equivalent to the static method call string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(string).

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.ReplaceWhiteSpace(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes and replaces with the given argument anything that is NOT in the following specified set of characters: alpha-numeric (a-zA-Z_), dash (-), and period (.)
member.param: The value from which to remove white space.
The replacement string for the characters to remove.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.RemoveAccents(System.String)
member.summary: Removes diacritics (accents) from the specified string.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.TitleCaseWords(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string into words using its current title-casing.
member.param: The string to split into words.
member.returns: A string of one or more words.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.ToCamelCase(System.String,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts the specified string to camel case.
member.param: The string to convert to camcel case.
An object that supplies culture-specific casing rules.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.EqualNoCase(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether this string and the specified content have the same value ignoring their case by using the comparer.
member.param: The value to compare against the content.
The content to compare against this string value.
member.returns: true if the value of the value parameter is the same as this string; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.ContainsNoCase(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether a sequence contains a specified element by using a specified using the comparer.
member.param: A sequence in which to locate a value.
The value to locate in the sequence.
member.returns: true if the source sequence contains an element that has the specified value; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.Sanitize(System.String)
member.summary: Removes \t characters in the string and trim additional space and carriage returns.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.SanitizeName(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes all undesired characters in the given name and returns one that is safe and clean to use as a URL, and optionally converts it to lower case.
member.param: true to convert the name to lower case; otherwise, leave it as is.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.StringExtensions.ParseKeyValuePairs(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the into a case-insensitive string dictionary.
member.param: A vertical pipe-separated list of key/value pairs.

member.name: M:Carfamsoft.ModelToView.Shared.TypeExtensions.TryParseByte(System.Type,System.String,System.Globalization.NumberStyles,System.IFormatProvider,System.Byte@)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified style and culture-specific format to its System.Byte equivalent.
member.param: A string containing a number to convert.
An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about . If is null, the thread current culture is used.
When this method returns, contains the 8-bit unsigned integer value equivalent to the number contained in s if the conversion succeeded, or zero if the conversion failed.
member.returns: true if was converted successfully; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Returns a localized string for a property name.

member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the specified culture, or null if name cannot be found in a resource set.
